property.caption: Two Handles Slider
property.description: Set true for a two handle slider, false for a one handle slider (only the Lower Handle Attribute will be used).

property.caption: Slider Minimum
property.description: The minimum value of the slider (integer).

property.caption: Slider Maximum
property.description: The maximum value of the slider (integer).

property.caption: Slider Step
property.description: The size of the interval between slider steps.

property.caption: Lower Handle Attribute
property.description: Entity Attribute (decimal) coupled with the lower handle of the slider.

property.caption: Upper Handle Attribute
property.description: Entity Attribute (decimal) coupled with the upper handle of the slider.

property.caption: Color Bar
property.description: Set true to display a green bar on the for the selected value/range.

property.caption: Display Value Labels
property.description: Set true to display the handle's value in a label.

property.caption: Direction
property.description: Configure the slider to increase left-to-right/top-to-bottom or right-to-left/bottom-to-top.

property.caption: Orientation
property.description: Configure the orientation of the slider. If Vertical, be sure to select the correct Direction value for your purposes. Also if Vertical, height must be manually set in the widget css (class .noUi-vertical)

property.caption: Build Pips
property.description: Set true to display slider values on the slider.

property.caption: Enforce Minimum Range
property.description: Set true to enforce a minimum size for the range between handles

property.caption: Minimum Range
property.description: Size of the minimum range; takes effect only if Enforce Minimum Range is true.

property.caption: Enforce Maximum Range
property.description: Set true to enforce a maximum size for the range between handles

property.caption: Maximum Range
property.description: Size of the maximum range; takes effect only if Enforce Maximum Range is true.
